ygData.subject: Running away from everything (Was:RE: Selo's)
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool thought Gaelaian.  An you should be able to run away from anything in the game, except one- Hasten Bootstrutter.  One hint to high level bards- don t use
ygData.messageBody:
Cool thought Gaelaian. An you should be able to run away from anything in the
game, except one- Hasten Bootstrutter. One hint to high level bards- don't use
your AOE non-party spells while running around trying to get named critters to
spawn unless you know he's not up.

This guy outruns anything. Could be because he had me to below 1/2 health when
I started running (in about 2 seconds).

Was pretty funny- glad my friendly neighborhood cleric was there!


Previous post:
--Gaelaian Galaenor, 22nd level bard looking forward to being able to run
away from everything.
